user_instruction: 'Send an email to TechSolutions Inc. (contact@tech.solution) with insights on our hiring process. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

      "text": "Hiring Process Overview"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8153-97b6-d0e7b3d900ce",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "The hiring process for student assistantship positions at Hamilton University involves several key steps:"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8120-ae2a-d84d85ccb095",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "1) Collecting applications"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-815e-9b5a-d9b89e74ad23",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "2) Initial screening by the HR department"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-81b1-9576-d3528094f3c7",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "3) Interviews conducted by the Academic Selection Panel"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-81ea-ba72-c8e8bbac4990",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "4) Deliberation and decision-making by the hiring committee"
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8110-ba16-f48358da53d9",
      "type": "paragraph",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "5) Offer letters sent out to selected candidates."
    }
  ]
}","annotations":null}

      "text": "Application deadline set for March 1st."
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8102-945a-d787afa1d71e",
      "type": "bulleted_list_item",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",

      "text": "HR screens applications by March 15th."

    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8154-b903-fb2a45a6ac46",
      "type": "bulleted_list_item",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "Interviews scheduled from March 20th to April 5th."
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-81c4-b4ac-d9434c7ee49f",
      "type": "bulleted_list_item",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "has_children": false,
      "text": "Hiring committee meets to make decisions by April 10th."
    },
    {
      "id": "20d0dc8f-a0db-8126-b51e-f98c37aaf969",
      "type": "bulleted_list_item",
      "created_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",
      "last_edited_time": "2025-06-09T08:32:00.000Z",

formatted_items.arguments:
{
  "to": [
    "contact@tech.solution"
  ],
  "subject": "Summary of Hamilton University Student Assistantship Hiring Process",
  "body": "Hello TechSolutions Team,

As requested, please find below a concise overview of Hamilton University’s student-assistantship hiring workflow. We hope this will help guide the design of your new student-management module.

1. Application
• Positions are posted on the Student Employment portal each winter with a firm submission deadline in early spring.
• Applicants complete an online form (see link ❶) and upload a résumé, unofficial transcript, and two references.

2. Initial Screening
• HR reviews submissions within roughly two weeks of the deadline, ensuring eligibility (minimum GPA, enrollment status, hour restrictions) and completeness.
• Qualified packets are forwarded to the relevant academic/administrative units.

3. Interviews
• Units schedule short video or in-person interviews over a three-week window in mid-spring.
• Standard interview guide (link ❷) is used for consistency and equal-opportunity compliance.

4. Selection & Offer
• Hiring committees rank candidates and submit their recommendations to HR.
• HR issues conditional offer letters pending background check and work-study verification.

5. Onboarding
• Selected assistants complete onboarding documents in the HR portal (tax forms, direct-deposit, confidentiality agreement) and attend a mandatory orientation session before their start date in early summer.

Key References
❶ Assistantship Application Form (Notion): https://www.notion.so/Assistantship-Position-Workflow-20d0dc8fa0db81d9907fdf2ecd367737
❷ Interview Guide & Rubric (Notion): https://www.notion.so/Hiring-Process-Overview-20d0dc8fa0db81c989d4f9912859ce59

If you need any additional details—such as field names, validation rules, or the orientation checklist—just let me know and I will provide them.

Thank you for collaborating with us on the new system. We look forward to seeing how your team streamlines these steps for our campus.

Best regards,
John
Human Resources Management Advisor
Hamilton University",
  "cc": null,
  "bcc": null,
  "sender": null
}

formatted_items.content: Email sent! Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if TechSolutions needs further information.
